summary: CalculatorPage header was updated to render an logo next to the existing “Soumyajit Dutta” text and keep the History/Calculator toggle in place. However, the diff shows no added static asset file for the uploaded logo image, so inclusion of the PNG in frontend static assets is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded logo image (file_00000000b77c72089c9effad0d4cec39.png) to the app’s static assets and reference it from the header UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The header now references /assets/file_00000000b77c72089c9effad0d4cec39.png, but the diff shows no added file and no modification to any assets/public directory to actually include the PNG as a static asset.
